title: Can anyone ID this font?
content:
Hi!

Can anyone identify this font?

Thank you.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014201132im_/http:/typophile.com/files/EJ_logo_standard_pantone%20copy_4591.jpg)
author: ThomasB

comments.content: One of the [Concord](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014201132/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/soneri/concord/) family will be close. Looks like the "s" is slightly different.
